schemes.name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
schemes.description: Direct income support scheme for small and marginal farmer households. Eligible farmers receive ₹2,000 every four months.

schemes.name: Bhamashah Scheme
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
schemes.description: Health insurance and social security scheme for women with emphasis on health and life protection.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
schemes.benefit: Loans up to ₹10 lakhs without collateral
schemes.description: Scheme to facilitate loans to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro business units without collateral security.

schemes.name: National Rural Livelihoods Mission
schemes.description: Community-driven development program focusing on reduction of poverty through livelihood initiatives.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Skill Development Scheme
schemes.benefit: Free vocational training and job placement
schemes.description: Skill development program providing vocational training to enhance employability of youth.

schemes.name: Startup India Scheme
schemes.ministry: Department for Promotion of Industry & Internal Trade
schemes.benefit: Tax exemptions, subsidized IPR registration, faster patent processing
schemes.description: Comprehensive scheme to encourage entrepreneurship and foster innovation-led startups.

schemes.name: National Scholarship Portal
schemes.benefit: Scholarships ranging from ₹12,000 to ₹1 lakh+ per annum
schemes.description: Consolidated platform for various central and state government scholarship schemes for students.

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat - PM-JAY
schemes.benefit: ₹5 lakh free hospitalization per family per year
schemes.description: World's largest public health insurance scheme providing health coverage to vulnerable families.

schemes.name: Integrated Programme for Senior Citizens
schemes.benefit: Subsidized medical care, food, entertainment, mobility
schemes.description: Comprehensive program for ensuring dignity and quality of life of senior citizens.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Matritva Vandana Yojana
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
schemes.benefit: ₹5,000 cash assistance for health and nutrition
schemes.description: Monetary assistance scheme for pregnant women and lactating mothers.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
schemes.benefit: Home loans up to ₹9 lakhs with interest subsidy
schemes.description: Housing scheme to provide affordable housing to economically weaker sections.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.benefit: Free LPG connection with 5 kg cylinder and stove
schemes.description: Scheme to provide clean cooking fuel to below poverty line households.
